creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Oceanus, god of the river.  Frontal bearded head with silver inlaid eyes against a formalized background of the scales of his body, within a modelled rim.  Small cheeks, nose and forehead.  Two dolphins rampant above act as a crown; two fish peer from the locks of his hair; two more dive out of his beard. top of roundel broken and missing
medium: Bronze with silver and copper inlays
title: Boss with Head of Oceanus
